name: MK Slider
author: Manoj Kumar

sections.description:
MK Slider : MK Slider is a WordPress slider with stunning effects and very easy to use. You can create any number of sliders in a matter of seconds without coding & image editing. It also support shortcode for adding it to posts or pages if you want to. MK Slider also provide the slider settings to each sliders created individually. Also there is a widget if you want to add the MK Slider to the sidebar of your wordpress blog.

  • WordPress Banner Slider/Slideshow.
  • Supports any number of sliders.
  • Can be added to posts/pages using shortcode.
  • Settings for each slider individually.
  • Allows to set the target attribute of the anchor tag individually.
  • Unlimited slides can be added to a slider.
  • Sidebar widget support added.

For more details: Click here

Created By: Manoj Rana

Email : manoj.rana91986@gmail.com

MK Slider Features

  • WordPress Banner Slider/Slideshow.
  • Supports any number of sliders.
  • Can be added to posts/pages using shortcode.
  • Settings for each slider individually.
  • Allows to set the target attribute of the anchor tag individually.
  • Unlimited slides can be added to a slider.
  • Sidebar widget support added.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  3. Now you can view MK Slider Tab added to your wordpress admin under the settings tab.

  4. Click ‘Add New’ to create a new slider. The shortcode and the template tag for the newly created slider will be visible in the right sidebar on the create new page. You can use them to either add the slider to posts/pages or in the template.
sections.faq:
How to add the slider to the template

You can get the template tag for the slider from the right sidebar of the edit slider window.

How to add the slider to the post/page

You can get the shortcode for the slider from the right sidebar of the edit slider window.

How many sliders can I create

You can create any number of slider you wan using MK Slider

How many I add MK Slider to sidebar

You can add the MK SLider to the sidebar by using the widget available in the widget area.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Released on 12/30/2012

1.2

  • Plugin upgraded to WordPress 3.5.
  • New image transition effects added.
  • Any number of sliders can now be created using MK Slider.
  • Released on 01/20/2013

1.3

  • New improved admin section.
  • Now unlimited slides can be added to a slider.
  • Sidebar widget supports added.
  • Released on 03/12/2013

1.3.1

  • Option to delete slide added.
  • Also some new slider controls added.
  • Released on 03/28/2013

1.3.2

  • The bug fixed which disabled the media insert into posts/pages after using MK Slider
  • Released on 04/11/2013

1.3.3

  • The conflict with some other plugins fixed
  • The option to set the link targets added.
  • Released on 04/15/2013

1.3.4

  • Donation link fixed

short_description: Wordpress Slider for posts & pages. Supports shortcode and sidebar widget to display slideshow.
